### Cancelled Tender Announcement: WO23SLSL

#### Notice Reference: PW-22-01017802

**Document Details**
----------------

* **Document Type**: Cancelled Tender Announcement
* **Notice Title**: Cancelled - WO23SLSL
* **Publication Date**: December 20, 2022
* **Caucse Closed Date**: March 31, 2026, at 2:00 PM (EST)

**Notice Details**
----------------

This tender announcement has been officially cancelled and will not proceed further.

#### Contracting Entity Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Defence Construction Canada (DCC)
* **Address**: Constitution Square, 19th Floor, 350 Albert Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K3, Canada
* **Contact Information**:
  + Name: Mark Smith
  + Email: mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
  + Phone: 613-859-0549

#### Tender Details
----------------

* **Tender Number**: WO23SLSL
* **Notice Type**: Request for Information
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Services Provided**: Construction services (see below for specific classification details)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: United States, Europe, Mexico, Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Manitoba

**Classification Details**
-----------------------

Construction services are classified under the following North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) codes and NSICS codes:

* **NAICS Classification Codes**:
  * 5121A -  One and Two Dwelling Buildings
  * 5122A -  Multi-Dwelling Buildings
  * 5123B -  Warehouses and Industrial Buildings
  * 5124B -  Commercial Buildings
  * 5128B -  Health Buildings
  * 5129B -  Other Buildings
* **United Nations Standard Products and Services Code (UNSPSC)**: None

This cancelled tender announcement shall be considered null and void, and all submitted bids will be discarded. If you have any questions or concerns about this notice, please contact Defence Construction Canada's tender team. [mark.smith](mailto:mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca). [Phone:](tel:+1-613-859-0549) This notice was prepared by an initial technical writing draft. 



You have 400 words. Your entry should only contain relevant information only and formatted with markdown for nice
